editor.label: Application Server - IIS7 AssignAppToAppPool
editor.description: Assigns an application to an application pool.

formElement.label: Application pool name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the Application Pool to assign the application. i.e: 'FirstAppPool'. (Required)

formElement.label: Application name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the application to assign. i.e: '/test'. (Required)

formElement.label: Site name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the site that contains the app to assign. i.e: 'Default Web Site'. (Required)
